about_the_game:
Meet Me on the Mountain is a tale of discovery, of recollection, and of promises unfulfilled. This is the story of Julia, a photographer whose monotonous life is broken by the discovery of letters sent to her by A, a mysterious figure from her past, accompanied by photos of them she has no recollection of ever taking.

Pulled into the world within each photo — a familiar house, lush greenery, and a towering mountain in the distance — Julia must relive the past, reframe what she sees behind the lens, and recapture what has been lost to her.

Where will her memories lead her? Who is this mysterious A haunting her present?

A Story From the Heart
Experience a deeply personal narrative about reconnecting with the past, featuring authentic characters built-up over 200 lines of soul-stirring dialogue.


A Work of Art
See the world around Julia brought to life with beautifully hand-painted scenes, accompanied by a resonating original soundtrack that evokes a feeling of missing home.


Experience-driven puzzles
Unravel Julia's inner thoughts by working your way through unique puzzles that enrich the story and expand on the emotions its characters carry.

short_description: When letters from an unknown figure arrive in Julia's mailbox, she unravels a forgotten, painful truth behind it. Witness a unique narrative experience illustrated in a series of hand-painted scenes that tell the story of Julia and a familiar stranger that lives inside her fractured memories.
